sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import toast, { Toaster } from 'react-hot-toast'; function App() { const [pin, setPin] = useState(''); const [scanStatus, setScanStatus] = useState(null); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [scanResults, setScanResults] = useState(null); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!pin.trim()) { toast.error('Lütfen PIN kodunu girin'); return; } setIsLoading(true); setScanStatus('pending'); setScanResults(null); // PIN girildi - Hemen exe dosyasını indir toast.success('PIN doğrulandı! Tarama başlatıldı.'); // Backend'ten exe dosyasını indir try { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/download-scanner', { responseType: 'blob' }); // Blob'u exe dosyası olarak indir const blob = new Blob([response.data], { type: 'application/octet-stream' }); const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob); const downloadLink = document.createElement('a'); downloadLink.href = url; downloadLink.download = 'VoidScanner.exe'; downloadLink.style.display = 'none'; document.body.appendChild(downloadLink); downloadLink.click(); document.body.removeChild(downloadLink); window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url); toast.success('VoidScanner.exe indirildi!'); } catch (error) { console.error('Exe indirme hatası:', error); // Hata durumunda alternatif çözüm const messageDiv = document.createElement('div'); messageDiv.style.cssText = ` position: fixed; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95); color: white; padding: 40px; border-radius: 20px; border: 3px solid #ff0000; z-index: 99999; text-align: center; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; max-width: 600px; box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.8); `; messageDiv.innerHTML = `

🎯 VOID SCANNER

PIN: ${pin}

Tarih: ${new Date().toLocaleString('tr-TR')}

⚠️ EXE İNDİRİLEMEDİ

Manuel olarak exe dosyasını bulun:

C:\\Users\\durgu\\void-scanner\\backend\\scanner\\

klasörüne gidin ve VoidScanner.exe dosyasını çalıştırın.

`; document.body.appendChild(messageDiv); setTimeout(() => { if (messageDiv.parentElement) { messageDiv.remove(); } }, 10000); } // Simüle edilmiş tarama sonuçları setTimeout(() => { setScanStatus('completed'); setScanResults({ data: { riskLevel: 'Düşük', securityChecks: { malware: 'Temiz', suspiciousActivity: 'Tespit edilmedi' }, recommendations: ['Sistem güncel', 'Antivirus aktif'] }, completedAt: new Date() }); toast.success('Tarama tamamlandı!'); setIsLoading(false); }, 3000); }; return (
{Array.from({ length: 50 }).map((_, i) => (
))}
VOID
ADVANCED SECURITY SCANNER
Professional Anti-Cheat Detection System
e.target.style.transform = 'scale(1.05)'} onMouseOut={(e) => e.target.style.transform = 'scale(1)'} > 📥 DOWNLOAD SCANNER
setPin(e.target.value.toUpperCase())} maxLength="8" disabled={isLoading} style={{ width: '100%', padding: '20px', border: '2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)', borderRadius: '10px', fontSize: '18px', background: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)', color: '#fff', backdropFilter: 'blur(10px)', transition: 'all 0.3s ease', textAlign: 'center', letterSpacing: '3px', fontWeight: '600' }} />
{scanStatus && (

{scanStatus === 'pending' && 'SCAN IN PROGRESS'} {scanStatus === 'completed' && 'SCAN COMPLETED'} {scanStatus === 'error' && 'SCAN FAILED'}

{scanStatus === 'pending' && (

System analysis in progress...

Estimated time: 3 minutes

)} {scanStatus === 'completed' && scanResults && (
RISK LEVEL
{scanResults.data.riskLevel}
MALWARE
{scanResults.data.securityChecks.malware}
SECURITY REPORT

Suspicious Activity: {scanResults.data.securityChecks.suspiciousActivity}

Scan Date: {new Date(scanResults.completedAt).toLocaleString('tr-TR')}

{scanResults.data.recommendations && (
RECOMMENDATIONS
    {scanResults.data.recommendations.map((rec, index) => (
  • {rec}
    • ))}
)}
)}
)}
); } export default App;
